mapper.select: select a.title,a.goal_sale,a.opinion,a.content,a.reg_date,a.id,a.date,a.estimate_distance,a.estimate_course,a.route,a.challenge_no,b.content as challenge_content from plan as a, challenge as b where a.challenge_no=b.challenge_no and a.id=#{id} and a.date=#{date};
mapper.update: update plan set title=#{title} ,goal_sale=#{goal_sale},opinion=#{opinion},content=#{content},reg_date=now(),estimate_distance=#{estimate_distance},estimate_course=#{estimate_course},challenge_no=#{challenge_no}, route=#{route} where id=#{id} and date=#{date};
mapper.delete: delete from plan where date=#{date} and id=#{id};
mapper.select: select goal_sale from plan where id=#{id} and date=#{date};

select a.id,a.title,a.goal_sale,a.opinion,a.content,a.reg_date,a.date,a.estimate_distance,a.estimate_course,a.challenge_no,b.content as challenge_content,a.route from plan as a, challenge as b, user as c where a.challenge_no=b.challenge_no and a.id=c.id and c.dept=(select dept from user where id=#{id}) and a.date=#{date};
